description:
Air Hockey iPro
You could find similar games in the catalog... But none like this one! We worked on every last detail so that your air hockey experience is as close to the real thing as possible!
Amazing play experience; play against  the device. Are you up to the challenge?

Features:
- Real life physics; you will not believe how real it feels!
- Quality Graphic interface by Danielo Lipele.
- Option to adjust difficulty
- Option to adjust colors for all elements; just tap on the element (striker/Puck) to change it in the settings screen.
- Enable/Disable graphic effects
- Amazing sound effects that you have the option to enable and disable
- Easy controls (Smooth and very responsive unlike similar apps)
